casebody.data:
In re the FORECLOSURE OF BROWN. No. 224PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Wilder Wadford, Weaverville, for Brown, Grover C., et al. Adam W. Bull, Asheville, for Almond, Nelson T. (Executor), et al. John R. Dillard, for First Choice Title, LLC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of July 2015 by Petitioners (Grover & Margaret Brown) to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
